title: 2015 MINI CINEMA Award Show
desc: You?re cordially invited to the 2015 Mini Cinema Award Show. A Red Carpet event honoring the achievement of Excellence for short films screened throughout 2014 & 2015. As an audience member you get to WATCH the FOUR films nominated for ?Best Picture? and vote for the winner. All Winners will be awarded with our prestigious bronze-finished Vintage Hollywood Camera trophy.
